knimeNode.name: Table To Image
knimeNode.shortDescription: Converts an image contained in a table row to an image object.

fullDescription.intro: Converts an image contained in the first row of the specified column into an image object. If the table consists of more than one row, all other rows will be ignored and a warning will be displayed.
fullDescription.option: Specifies the column containing the image to convert.

ports.inPort: Input table containing the image to convert.
ports.outPort: Image port containing the converted image.
